fields.description: The benchmarks you use for assessing performance and potential are largely up to you. You will see we've provided some guidelines. Click the grid to get started.
Excels in current role and utilizes their skills outside of their current role in exceptional ways.
Excels in current role and utilizes their skills outside of their current role.
Excels in current role and can demonstrate initiative outside their role when provoked.
Excels in current role but unable or unwilling to expand into other roles.
Meets expectations for the role and utilizes their skills outside of their current role in exceptional ways.
Meets expectations for the role and utilizes their skills outside of their current role.
Meets expectations for the role and can demonstrate initiative outside their role when provoked.
Meets expectations for the role but unable or unwilling to expand into other roles.
Provides lower than expected contributions in current role but utilizes their skills outside of their current role.
Provides lower than expected contributions in current role but can demonstrate initiative outside their role when provoked.
Provides lower than expected contributions in current role and unable or unwilling to expand into other roles.
Provides little to no value in current role but utilizes their skills outside of their current role in exceptional ways.
Provides little to no value in current role but utilizes their skills outside of their current role.
Provides little to no value in current role but can demonstrate initiative outside their role when provoked.
Provides little to no value in current role and unable or unwilling to expand into other roles.
Provides lower than expected contributions in current role but utilizes their skills outside of their current role in exceptional ways.
